tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Had issues related to Uterine fibroid and severe anemia, it was the most fearful time i had gone through and since i visited Doctor Sonal i got a big sigh of relief , she explained me the risks in a detailed manner and gave me the confidence and courage to undergo surgery, believe me the surgery went well and recovered fully within a month.
 She is an amazing personality and her presence gives positive vibes, wish her the Best Luck.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Ovarian Cyst Removal,
review: Had visited Dr Sonal Kumta for my delivery and also the removal of ovarian cyst. Was extremely happy the way she handled both the deliveries and the operation. She ensured that all the details of my health condition are explained very clearly and without creating a panic.  She attended to all my quries patiently and guided me very well both pre operation and post operation. Had a few complications during my deliveries, but it was handled very well by Dr Kumta. Would recommend her highly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have been visiting Dr Sonal kumta from the day I found out about my pregnancy .

From the beginning itself I found her extremely approachable . She didnâ€™t enforce any additional tests and the way she dealt  to the pregnancy was very systematic 

She was very patient with all the queries I had, and also gave me immense support and courage till the day I delivered.

Her team at Fortis hospital mulund ( Dr Sonoli , Dr Shivani ) ensured a safe delivery and I was very well taken care of throughout my stay there.

I cannot recommend Dr Sonal Kumta and her team enough and am extremely thankful to her for making my pregnancy a smooth journey .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am 37 years old and conceived my first baby a few months back. I visited Dr. Sonal Kumta, who asked about my health history and suggested all necessary tests. She explained everything in detail and answered all my questions, which is amazing because she takes care of her patients very well. My case was a high-risk pregnancy, so all the necessary tests were done on time. In the third trimester, my platelets went severely down and I had been asked to get admitted; however, with the help of Fortis Hematologist right treatments were given to increase the platelet count. Dr. Sonal was fully prepared for all scenarios and we were explained all possibilities in detail for delivery. Very safe delivery was done considering all risks for my health and also for the baby's health. We are very thankful to meet such an amazing doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited Dr. Kumta for prenatal care and delivery of my wife Shashi from almost 1st month of her pregnancy. Dr. instilled such confidence in us that we never felt any concern for well being of mother or baby. At every stage of pregnancy she explained everything patiently. The delivery was a C section one which was done by Dr. Kumta. Our baby is now about 8 months old and he is healthy and growing well. We are thankful to Dr. Kumta for giving our first time parenthood journey a happy start...thank u Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Mine was a high risk pregnancy due to age and diabetes. I am thankful to God that I met Dr Kumta. Straight forward, caring & genuine. My major milestones during my pregnancy, -With slight change in diet and walking for 45 min daily and guidance from diabetologist suggested by Dr Kumta, I lost 14 kgs.-My HBA1C was detected 8.5 (ideal <6) came down to 5.5.-My NIPT report was in low risk grp.-Every blood, urine and sonography report turned out to be positive.Everything is possible with good support and guidance and with positivity in mind, willingness to work hard and give your ðŸ’¯%. I recommend any high risk pregnancies to visit Dr Kumta and believe me you won't regret.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Caesarean Section (C Section),Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Tests,
review:
We are very thankful to Dr. Sonal Kumta. *** ** ****** **** **** ******. When my wife was pregnant, we decided to consult Dr. Kumta. From day 1, doctor was very caring and supportive. She explained each and every step in pregnancy and guided us in detail.  Since age of my wife was little concern, she suggested relevant tests, sonographies at various stages so the there should not be any doubt and all possibilities are ruled out.   Also it was a time of covid pandemic during my wife's pregnancy . During this time she supported emotionally and mentally.  She built confidence and positivity in us.  Doctor also conducted the C section surgery with atmost care and precautions. 
I must say Dr. Kumta has given us joy of bundle safely in our hand during this pandemic situation.
 We very much recommend Dr. Kumta to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: An amazing person makes an amazing doctor and that's exactly what Dr. Sonal Kumta is, an excellent doctor. I have had previous gynae history which was also treated by Dr. Sonal brilliantly and even with a previous history, I was able to have my first baby without much complications under her treatment and care. Throughout my experience with her during my pregnancy, never did she turn down any of my queries and answered all my questions to the point and always had a friendly approach. You can trust her completely with your treatment as you can be sure that you are in safe hands. Thank you Dr. Sonal Kumta for your support, encouragement and timely guidance all through my treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Exercise,
review:
One of the most finest doctors i have ever seen in Mumbai.
She has her own clinic in Mulund West and attached to Fortis Hospital Mulund.******** ** *** ********* *** end to end treatment of the patient.
She has handled critical cases as well in her career and among them was one of them was my relative's.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very thorough professional and a good doctor,  she was our doctor from conception to delivery , she did an excellent job, patient suffered from preeclampsia and mild HELLP she was able to diagnose and give timely treatment and wife underwent surgery and healthy baby was delivered

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Excellent doctor. A must recommend! I had a normal delivery in Jan this year and the doc was with me during the entire duration of my labor making all possible attempt that I go for a normal one as I had all the possible chances. At one point I gave up for a normal one and asked for a c section but she still insisted that I try more and there was it that my baby came to this world all healthy and hearty through normal delivery. A doctor you can trust and have faith in!

I had seen the doc for my entire period starting from pre-conception checkups to the delivery and Dr sonal handled all test/checkup very well. She won't ask for any test that are not required and don't unnecessarily burden you with checkups and  test. She goes with the normal flow and do as per the need.  

A humble person, soft-spoken and a very patient person who answered all the queries well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Amazing and wonderful doctor,i fully recommend to consult dis doctor.i was type 1 diabetic and thyroid patient .but my pregnancy journey went smoothly under her consultation.very supportive and caring doctor..

tags: None
review: **** ******* Had been for my wife. *** *** **** *********  ** * ******* She is fast clear and transparent. Reasonably priced. I feel best in Mulund. Above all genuine advice. Getting good doctors is a blessing

tags: Explanation of the health issue,

review: I had a very bad experience with this doctor.She is good till things are smooth.* ****  *** ******* **** *** ********* ** ****** ******* ** ***** *********.Please don't hesitate to take a second opinion if you feel like. *** ***** *** ******* ***** ** **** **** *** ***** ** *** ********.I regret not taking a second opinion and trusting her.She didn't tell us the health problems my baby might face.I strongly do not recommend this doctor.

tags: None
review: She took great care while doing the test considering it was my first time. Also, had a breast examination done.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Sonal was very helpful and her assistant Dr. was helpful too. I was at peace after meeting them and they explained in layman language.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Had a great experience with Dr. Kumta. Listen patiently the problems and explain in detail. Also avoid long list of medicines and frequent visits.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Kumta is an understanding and an experienced doctor. She patiently answered all the queries. I had a good experience with her.
